testimonials.headline: Real St. Johns County Moving Stories
testimonials.subheadline: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what your neighbors in St. Johns County are saying about their experience with T&E Movers.

reviews.testimonialText: We've used T&E for two moves within Julington Creek now, and they are fantastic. Professional, courteous, and incredibly efficient. They make a stressful day so much easier. Wouldn't trust anyone else with our belongings.

The T&E team was outstanding for our move to RiverTown. They were careful with our furniture and even helped us position everything perfectly in the new house. The crew was friendly and hardworking. A truly 5-star service.

Moving from our apartment to our first home in Durbin Crossing was a huge step, and T&E Movers handled it flawlessly. They were on time, the price was fair, and they took great care with all our things. Highly recommended!

faq.headline: St. Johns County Moving Questions, Answered
faq.subheadline: As St. Johns County's local moving experts for over 25 years, we have the answers to all your moving questions.

items.question: How much does a local move in St. Johns County cost?
items.answer: Our local moves start at just $397. The final cost depends on the size of your home, the specific communities we're moving between, and any extra services. We offer transparent, price-lock guarantees.

items.question: Do you work with the various HOAs in St. Johns County?
items.answer: Yes, we are experienced in working with the HOAs in all major St. Johns County communities, including Julington Creek, Durbin Crossing, and RiverTown. We ensure all rules are followed for a smooth move.

items.question: How far in advance should I book my move?
items.answer: We suggest booking 3-4 weeks in advance, as St. Johns County is a high-demand area, especially during school breaks and summer months.

items.question: What areas do you serve within St. Johns County?
items.answer: We serve all of St. Johns County, including St. Johns, Fruit Cove, Julington Creek, Durbin Crossing, RiverTown, and surrounding areas. We also handle moves to and from neighboring counties.

items.question: Do you offer packing services for large homes?
items.answer: Yes, our full-service packing is perfect for large homes in St. Johns County. Our professional team can efficiently pack your entire house, saving you time and ensuring your belongings are protected.

items.question: Can you move items to a storage unit?
items.answer: Absolutely. We can move your belongings to a local storage unit in St. Johns County, or to our own secure, climate-controlled storage facility.

movingTips.headline: Top Tips for a Smooth St. Johns County Move
movingTips.subheadline: After 15,000+ local moves in Northeast Florida, we know what makes for a seamless relocation. Here are our top insider tips.

tips.title: Check Your HOA Rules
tips.description: Many St. Johns County communities have specific moving day rules. Check with your HOA for approved hours and parking, and share that info with us.

tips.title: Hire True Local Movers
tips.description: Choose a licensed and insured moving company that knows St. Johns County. We understand the traffic patterns and community layouts to save you time.

tips.title: Declutter Before Packing
tips.description: Get rid of unwanted items to reduce your load and save money. St. Johns County has many great donation centers.

tips.title: Label for Your New Home
tips.description: Label boxes by room and contents. This makes unpacking at your new St. Johns County home much faster and helps our crew place items correctly.

tips.title: Use Quality Materials
tips.description: Florida's humidity can weaken cheap boxes. We provide professional packing services and premium materials to protect your belongings.

tips.title: Protect Your Valuables
tips.description: Keep important documents, jewelry, and irreplaceable items with you during the move. Don't pack them in the moving truck.

tips.title: Schedule Utilities Early
tips.description: Arrange for utilities in St. Johns County to be transferred or started before moving day. You'll want that AC running!

tips.title: Pack an Essentials Kit
tips.description: Pack a 'first night' box with snacks, toiletries, chargers, and a change of clothes that travels with you, not on the truck.

tips.title: Communicate With Us
tips.description: Let your T&E moving coordinator know about specialty items, access issues, or time restrictions. Clear communication is key!

tips.title: Relax & Settle In
tips.description: You're moving to a great community! Let our experienced team handle the heavy lifting so you can start enjoying your new home.
